text: "Hard as a Rock" is a 1995 song by Australian hard rock band AC/DC and is the leading single from their 13th studio album Ballbreaker. It went to number 33 in the United Kingdom, number 1 in Finland, number 14 in Australia and number 16 in New Zealand and the Netherlands. ==Track listings== * CD single # "Hard as a Rock" – 4:30 # "Caught with Your Pants Down" – 4:14 * 7-inch single # "Hard as a Rock" (LP version) – 4:30 # "Caught with Your Pants Down" (LP version) – 4:14 Category:1995 songs Category:AC/DC songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Hard as a Rock
